description.text: I am a Software Engineer based in Lahore, Pakistan, working as a Backend Developer in the
MoonBeam
team at
Arbisoft.
Apart from developing backends I love working on Deep Learning and Data Dcience projects and deploying them to the Cloud.
A 22 years old with a Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering from
National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST),
Pakistan, who likes basketball, cricket and E-gaming.

I have a broad skill set, comprising of Backend Development with django and flask, Data Science using pandas, numpy, dask and matplotlib, Machine/Deep learning using Tensorflow, Keras and PyTorch, Cloud Solutions using AWS and Azure. I even have 2 MS Azure certifications!
Here are some details about what have I done to get here and what I have been upto. My educational and professional background is as follows:
I'm part of the MoonBeam team at Arbisoft Ltd working as a backend engineer. Currently we are developing a podcast recommendation engine for
Audacy.
My responsibilities are to:
Develop and Maintain Data Fetching Pipelines
Develop and Maintain Model Training Pipeline
Model Deployment using Flask as Backend

The tools I've been using to carry out these responsibilities include python libraries such as pandas, numpy, dask etc, snowflake, MongoDB, AWS services such as SageMaker, Lambda, S3, EC2, EventBridge etc.
I am a level 2 seller on fiverr, my pool of services include Backend, Data Science and Deep/Machine Learning. Some prominent projects I worked on for my clients are:
Development of Sales Management System for a real estate company with a Flask backend and HTML/CSS frontend.
Development and Deployment of a semi-supervised text classifier on a Centos6 VM on MS Azure with a Flask backend.
Training and Development of an English to Spanish Neural Machine Translation transformer model from scratch using Tensorflow, numpy and pandas.
You can still find me on fiverr here,  but I'm not taking any new projects at the moment.

institute.name: National University of Sciences and Technology

description.text: In university I pursued a Software Engineering Degree from
School of Electrical Engineering and Computers Sciences (SEECS).
I started playing basketball again, after a long time. I was also a part of
NUST Media Club
and
NUST Fitness Club
for the 2019-2020 tenure. I partied hard and studied harder to graduate with a 3.53/4.0 CGPA.

I majored in Biology in school and realized it was not for me so I decided to pursue a career in engineering. I took Maths, Physics and Chemistry as my majors. I started E-gaming to balance out the academic stress and now I can't stop. I even assembled a PC from scratch for gaming. With E-gaming helping me along the way, I managed to get 88% in college.

In Pakistan 9th and 10th grade are called high school. I majored in biology and other science subjects (Physics, Chemistry and Maths) in high schoolI. I used to play basketball a lot in my school days. I was the vice captain of my basketball team in 8th grade, but had to drop out to maintain good grades. It was tough but it paid off when I got 91% in high school.

description.text: I have learned a lot from the projects I've done in the past,. I have worked on projects ranging from web development to data science and machine learning. I have also worked on cloud deployments and CI/CD pipelines. I have listed some of my skills below.

services.name: Backed Development
services.description: I have vast experience developing multiple backends for different projects using python web frameworks (flask and django). I am currently working on a django backend for a recommendation engine in my current job. To look at some of these projects visit my github.

services.name: Data Science
services.description: I have worked on various data science projects which utilized python data science libraries like pandas, numpy and dask. My most recent project includes feature extraction and feature engineering from data which is fed to a model for generating recommendations.

services.name: Cloud Deployments
services.description: I am a 2 time Microsoft certified Azure engineer, I also have experience with different AWS services such as SageMaker, EC2, Lambda etc. I have deployed multiple web backends to VMs with CI/CD using Jenkins and Docker.

services.name: Development WorkFlows
services.description: I am familiar with the software development life cycle using agile workflows like SCRUM, using tools like Jira and Confluence.

contact_section.title: I'd Love To Hear From You.

description.text: You have something you want to say to me? Feel free to send me an email! I'll try to get back to you as soon as possible.
